# Data - pone.0296906.s001.dta


```{r}
dat <- read_dta("./pone.0296906.s001.dta")
glimpse(dat)
```

Data cleaning, modification, and adding a dummy variable on whether a painting was sold or not.

```{r}
dat <- mutate(dat, 
              Artist = as.integer(Artist),
              sold = ifelse(!is.na(Hammerprice), 1, 0),
              Unsigned1 = factor(Unsigned1),
              Unsigned1 = fct_relevel(Unsigned1, "0", "1"),
              surface_cm2 = SizeLengthhÃ¶jd * SizeWidthbredd,
              surface_squared = surface_cm2^2,
              Type = factor(Type),
              Type = fct_relevel(Type, "oil", "mixed", "pastel", "water colour"),
              Theme = factor(Theme),
              Theme = fct_relevel(Theme, "L", "A", "N", "O", "P", "PO", "S", "U"),
              House = factor(House),
              House = fct_relevel(House, "A", "B", "U"),
              December = ifelse(str_ends(Event, "12.$"), 1, 0),
              December = factor(December),
              December = fct_relevel(December, "0", "1")
              )
glimpse(dat)
```

Select final variables
```{r}
fit_dat <- dat |> select(sold, Unsigned1, surface_cm2, surface_squared, Type, Theme, House, December, Hammerprice)
```

Fit a Probit Model
```{r}
probit_model <- glm(sold ~ Unsigned1 + surface_cm2 + surface_squared + Type + Theme + House + December,data = fit_dat, family = binomial(link = "probit"))
```

```{r}
fit_dat$predicted_prob <- predict(probit_model, type = "response")
```

```{r}
fit_dat$IMR1 <- invMillsRatio(x = probit_model)$IMR1
```

```{r}
final_model <- lm(Hammerprice ~ Unsigned1 + surface_cm2 + surface_squared + Type + Theme + House + December + IMR1, data = fit_dat)
tidy(final_model)
```
